QuestData.Title: A Pilot's Revenge
QuestData.Description: Hildelve wrote in his journal that he was attacked by Mangeclaw, a "huge Ice Claw Bear." He drove off the beast, but not before it mauled him savagely.$B$BJudging from the state of Hildelve's body, Mangeclaw must have later returned and killed him.$B$BHowever, Hildelve wrote in his journal his one, final wish:$B$BRevenge against Mangeclaw.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Look around Hildelve's body. The bear will certainly be nearby.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Mangeclaw.$B$BBring his Mangy Claw and Hildelve's Journal to Pilot Hammerfoot at the South Gate Outpost.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hello, $n. Do you have word of my friend Hildelve?
QuestData.RewardText: This is grim news, for Hildelve was a good friend. And I wish I could have been there with you when you found the beast, Mangeclaw!$B$BThank you, $n. Your deed will be remembered by the pilots of the Ironforge Siege Brigade.
